Name: Rafaela Cavalcante da Silva
Location: Rua José Carlos Bezerra, Fortaleza, CE
Description:
According to witnesses, a friend of the victim's had been shot dead as well.

TvT project: Jangadeiro Online, online portal, 03.02.2012

Name: Soraia (Valmir) da Silva
Description:
Soraya had been abducted and tortured without knowing or stating the reason. After being able to go home, she felt bad and was taken to hospital, where she died. It was found that she had had pieces of wood inserted into the rectum and intestines and the penis burnt.

TvT partner organisation  Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans. montanhasrn.wordpress.com   24.02.2012

Name: Deoni Jones
Description:
Deonie was a person of color. She was attacked by a man at a bus stop and stabbed in the head. She died in hospital.

Note that tdor.info gives her date of death as 2 Feb 2012.

TvT project: Washington Blade 04.02.2012; Metro Weekly 11.04.2012

Name: Helen Jabor (Thiago da Silva Carvalho)
Description: TvT project: Patrulha RV, online portal, 06.02.2012

Name: (Tiago) da Silva Garcia
Location: Rua Sérgio Gasparetto, Foz do Iguaçu, PR
Description: TvT project: Quem a Homofobia Matou Hoje?, online portal, 11.02.2012

Name: Melda (Metin) Yuksel
Description:
The victim was shot by her brother in her apartment. The court gave decreased sentence to the perpetrator (16 years of imprisonment) with the argument that the perpetrator was under "heavy provocation".

TVT project: TGEU SC member Kemal Ordek

Name: Dulce (Ivis Rolando) Mejía
Description:
The victim died of three gun shots in the head. She was a member of an association of the gay community and a promoter of HIV/AIDS prevention.

TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans: Periódico El Heraldo Online 14.02.2012

Location: Av. Jones dos Santos Neves, Barra de São Francisco, ES

Name: (Jorge Luiz) Feretti
Description:
The victim's body was found on 18 February near a highway, the face covered in blood.

TvT project: Interativa Regional, online portal, 21.02.2012

Name: (Paulo Afonso) Martins
Location: Rua Marechal Floriano, Porto Alegro, RS
Description:
The alleged perpetrator has been arrested. According to witnesses, victim and perpetrator llived in the same apartment and had an argument the night before the killing

TvT project: Radio Guaiba, 21.02.2012

Name: Name Unknown
Description:
An anonymous call reported the dead body to the police. The victim had received a shot at point blank in the head.

TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans: LaPoliciaca.com 23.02.2012

Name: Evelyn (Daniel Arlex) Ossa Rodríguez
Description:
The perpetrators entered the victim’s apartment and shot her in the head. Evelyn was from France and had come to Medellín shortly before her death.

TvT partner organization: Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans www.tuseguridad.ec 23.02.2012

Name: (Roberto Paulo) de Campos
Location: Estrada do Formigueiro, Lowland Grande, Mato Grosso
Description:
The victim was a sex worker. After being Stripped naked and stoned on a road in a rural area, she was left for six hours until being found, trying to indicate the perpetrator(s) to the police. Shortly after, she died.

TvT project: Media News, online portal, 24.02.2012

Name: Monserrat (Jonathan José) Pineda
Description:
After constant threats by a security guard, Monserrat Pineda reported the aggressor to the police. As the victim passed the security guard’s place of work, she was shot. She died in hospital.

Monserrat was a member of the activist organisation Colectivo Unidad Color Rosa.

TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans: Periódico La Tribuna, Online 28.02.2012

Name: Name Unknown
Description:
The victim was of Brazilian descent.

TvT project: Paperblog 28.02.2012

Name: Name Unknown
Description:
Judicial authorities and members of the Armed Forces confirmed the report of three executed trans persons, two of whom were trans women.

TvT partner organisation  Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans. ivpressonline.com 29.02.2012
